name: CElebrat SW2pro Multifunctional Smart Watch
description: This device features a 1.83-inch TFT touch screen with a resolution of 240x280, offering a clear and responsive display. It is IP56 water-resistant, providing protection against dust and water splashes. Powered by the AB8918B CPU with 32MB ROM, it supports Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, including call functionality. The battery has a capacity of 190mAh, delivering a battery life of 7 to 15 days, and supports magnetic charging with a full charge time of approximately 2 hours. The device also includes a range of health and fitness features, such as female physiological cycle recording, multiple exercise modes, and heart rate monitoring. Additionally, it supports multiple languages, making it accessible to a diverse range of users.
features: 1.83 inch center large screen shocking vision

name: Celebrat SW-13 Multi-Function Smart Watch
description: This smart device offers a perfect blend of style, functionality, and convenience. It supports multiple sports modes and health management features to help you stay on top of your fitness goals, along with Bluetooth calling for hands-free communication. With easy touch controls, you can play or skip songs, answer or hang up calls, and manage functions effortlessly—all with a tap of your fingertips. The package includes three interchangeable straps, allowing you to switch up your look daily and express your unique style on any occasion.
features: Touch Controls for music and calls

name: Wireless Bluetooth K9 Microphone
description: Omnidirectional Pickup High Density Spray-proof Sponges used with these High-sensitivite Microphones enable 360-degree sound reception within the distance of 50ft. Wide Compatibility as works with androids 6.0 or above with USB C interface ( Type C interface), Laptops or personal computers with USB A or USB C interface. Intelligent Noise Reduction.These high sensitive mics reduces the interference of the surrounding environment so as to provide professional clean and clear audio. Supports Various Softwares Designed for Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, Zoom Conference, Interview, Podcast, Vlog, e.t.c.
features: No APP or Bluetooth is needed Plug and Play
65FT Audio Range & 6H Working Time Wide Versatilit
1 x Receiver with USB C Plug

name: 3 in 1 Plug and Play Microphone
description: Introducing the 3-in-1 Wireless Lavalier Microphone – K15, the ultimate audio solution for content creators, professionals, and enthusiasts alike. Designed with versatility and convenience in mind, this cutting-edge microphone offers professional-quality sound for mobile phones, compatibility with Type-C mobile devices, and a wireless lapel for cameras. Whether you’re vlogging, conducting interviews, or giving presentations, the 3-in-1 Wireless Lavalier Microphone – K15 ensures your audio is crisp, clear, and reliable.
features: Easy to use and set up
Long battery life for extended use
Ideal for vlogging, interviews, and presentations

name: Flexible Keyboard
description: Designed to meet the needs of modern users, this innovative keyboard combines functionality with convenience, making it an essential tool for anyone looking to enhance their computing experience. Whether you’re a frequent traveler, a tech enthusiast, or someone who values space-saving solutions, our flexible keyboard is the perfect addition to your setup.
features: Ideal for Travelers and Tech Enthusiasts

name: Car Phone Holder
description: The Car Phone Holder is a versatile and convenient device that allows you to securely hold your phone in your car. It is designed with a flexible design, making it easy to carry and use. The holder is compatible with most Bluetooth devices, allowing for easy pairing and connection. It also includes a range of features, such as noise cancellation, echo cancellation, and echo suppression, to ensure clear and high-quality audio. The holder is powered by a rechargeable battery, providing up to 8 hours of continuous use.
features: Locking is not easy to fall off

description: The Phone Stand is a versatile and convenient device that allows you to securely hold your phone. It is designed with a flexible design, making it easy to carry and use.
